name: Exploring the Hidden Gems of Paris
shortDescription: Discover the lesser-known attractions of Paris beyond the Eiffel Tower and Louvre. From charming alleys to secret gardens, Paris holds hidden gems waiting to be explored.

name: Cultural Immersion in Morocco: From Marrakesh to the Sahara
shortDescription: Dive deep into the heart of Morocco, experiencing its vibrant culture, historic cities, and breathtaking landscapes.

name: A Journey Through the Heart of Italy
shortDescription: Experience the rich culture, history, and cuisine of Italy from Rome to Florence.
